casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Eugene Tyrone DeCASTRO. No. 221A93-3. Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 16, 2007. Barry McNeill, Special Deputy Attorney General, Susan Doyle, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the fourth motion filed on the 11th day of October 2007 by Defendant for Extension of Time to File Petition for Writ of Certiorari:

"Motion Allowed. By order of the Court in conference this the 16th day of October 2007."
